label: Illness
comment: A WHO MDH (Maritime Declaration of Health) reported illness or disease for an onboard person.

datatypeProperties.comment: A code specifying a case disposition of this MDH illness.
A comment, expressed as text for this MDH illness.
A code specifying a health status of this MDH illness.
The indication of whether or not the health status has been reported for this MDH illness.
A nature, expressed as text, of this MDH illness.
A symptom onset date, time, date time or other date time value for this MDH illness.
A treatment, expressed as text, for this MDH illness.

objectProperties.comment: A logistics evacuation location for this MDH illness.

referencedBy.comment: An MDH (Maritime Declaration of Health) reported illness or disease for this transport person.
